description: This file is an ESLint configuration script written in JavaScript, utilizing ES Module syntax to define and export ESLint configuration extensions with Next.js specific settings.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Returns the directory name of a path.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a path.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Generates an array of extended ESLint configurations based on provided presets.
